articles.author: Thomas Schlachter
articles.title: Shohei Ohtani won’t pitch again this season after tearing UCL; hits MLB-leading home run in same game - CNN
articles.description: Shohei Ohtani won’t pitch again in the 2023 MLB season after suffering a tear to the ulnar collateral ligament (UCL) in his right elbow, Los Angeles Angels general manager Perry Minasian confirmed.
articles.content:
Shohei Ohtani wont pitch again in the 2023 MLB season after suffering a tear to the ulnar collateral ligament (UCL) in his right elbow, Los Angeles Angels general manager Perry Minasian confirmed.
